settings.text: We offer DIY buckets of flowers, bouquets and more for the wedding party, or a mix of both. Whatever you go for, they will help make your special day sensational and you even more stunüëèningüëè than you already are, you gorgeous thing you

settings.title: Buckets of blooms
settings.text:
Getting buckets of flowers and doing your own wedding decorations can be a really lovely way of having personal and meaningful decorations, while saving you money at the same time.

When you order our buckets, you will be getting a curated selection of the best flowers and foliage that works well together.

settings.title: Bouquets and Buttonholes
settings.text:
To make things a bit easier for you, we are very happy to make bouquets for the wedding party. We don't want to make too many assumptions about what form your special day will take, so we tried to make things simple. Just pick however many of each size bouquet works for you.

  • Bride, groom, and wedding party? How about 1 showstopper and 3 medium bouquets, and 4 button holes
  • Are both of you in gowns? Why not go for 2 showstoppers? You know you want to
  • Both in suits? Buttonholes all around

However you do you, let us know and we'd love to make it work for you.

settings.heading: Seasonal DIY buckets
settings.description: An overflowing bucket of curated seasonal flowers and foliage. Expect around 40 stems per bucket

settings.heading: Showstopper bouquets
settings.description: For whoever wants the biggest, most luxurious bouquet of the day. Probably the bouquet for the bride, but we think anyone can be a showstopper if they want to!

settings.heading: Supporting bouquets
settings.description: Smaller than the showstopper, but still stunning.

settings.heading: Buttonholes
settings.description: For whichever lapels need zhuzhing up
